name: Newbie Challenge
task: Run 1 mile in 12 minutes, perform 10 pushups, and 15 situps.

name: Newbie Strength Test
task: Perform 1 pullup, 10 squats, and 10 burpees.

name: Newbie Endurance
task: Hold a plank for 30 seconds, and do 20 jumping jacks.

name: Beginner Challenge
task: Run 1 mile in 10 minutes, perform 20 pushups, and 25 situps.

name: Beginner Strength Test
task: Perform 2 pullups, 20 squats, and 20 burpees.

name: Beginner Endurance
task: Hold a plank for 45 seconds, and do 30 jumping jacks.

name: Novice Challenge
task: Run 1.5 miles in 13 minutes, perform 30 pushups, and 35 situps.

name: Novice Strength Test
task: Perform 3 pullups, 30 squats, and 30 burpees.

name: Novice Endurance
task: Hold a plank for 1 minute, and do 40 jumping jacks.

name: Intermediate Challenge
task: Run 2 miles in 16 minutes, perform 40 pushups, and 45 situps.

name: Intermediate Strength Test
task: Perform 5 pullups, 40 squats, and 40 burpees.

name: Intermediate Endurance
task: Hold a plank for 1.5 minutes, and do 50 jumping jacks.

name: Skilled Challenge
task: Run 2.5 miles in 20 minutes, perform 50 pushups, and 55 situps.

name: Skilled Strength Test
task: Perform 7 pullups, 50 squats, and 50 burpees.

name: Skilled Endurance
task: Hold a plank for 2 minutes, and do 60 jumping jacks.

name: Advanced Challenge
task: Run 3 miles in 24 minutes, perform 60 pushups, and 65 situps.

name: Advanced Strength Test
task: Perform 10 pullups, 60 squats, and 60 burpees.

name: Advanced Endurance
task: Hold a plank for 2.5 minutes, and do 70 jumping jacks.

name: Expert Challenge
task: Run 3.5 miles in 28 minutes, perform 70 pushups, and 75 situps.

name: Expert Strength Test
task: Perform 15 pullups, 70 squats, and 70 burpees.

name: Expert Endurance
task: Hold a plank for 3 minutes, and do 80 jumping jacks.

name: Elite Challenge
task: Run 4 miles in 32 minutes, perform 80 pushups, and 85 situps.

name: Elite Strength Test
task: Perform 20 pullups, 80 squats, and 80 burpees.

name: Elite Endurance
task: Hold a plank for 3.5 minutes, and do 90 jumping jacks.

name: Master Challenge
task: Run 4.5 miles in 36 minutes, perform 90 pushups, and 95 situps.

name: Master Strength Test
task: Perform 30 pullups, 90 squats, and 90 burpees.

name: Master Endurance
task: Hold a plank for 4 minutes, and do 100 jumping jacks.

name: Legendary Challenge
task: Run 5 miles in 40 minutes, perform 100 pushups, and 105 situps.

name: Legendary Strength Test
task: Perform 40 pullups, 100 squats, and 100 burpees.

name: Legendary Endurance
task: Hold a plank for 4.5 minutes, and do 110 jumping jacks.

name: Mythical Challenge
task: Run 5.5 miles in 44 minutes, perform 110 pushups, and 115 situps.

name: Mythical Strength Test
task: Perform 50 pullups, 110 squats, and 110 burpees.

name: Mythical Endurance
task: Hold a plank for 5 minutes, and do 120 jumping jacks.

name: Godlike Challenge
task: Run 6 miles in 48 minutes, perform 120 pushups, and 125 situps.

name: Godlike Strength Test
task: Perform 60 pullups, 120 squats, and 120 burpees.

name: Godlike Endurance
task: Hold a plank for 5.5 minutes, and do 130 jumping jacks.
